column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat|salience|identity
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Summary1=(human1) In this letter, an inmate in jail threatens a woman, who works at Walgreens and has perpetrated an insurance scam and stolen some things, that they will reveal this to the police and testify against her unless the woman drops the charges that put the author of the letter in jail, resulting in 3-5 years in jail for a class E felony.

#Summary2=(claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) In this letter, an incarcerated person threatens to report the recipient's alleged insurance fraud to police detectives and have them arrested at their Walgreens job unless they drop unspecified charges against the writer.

#Summary3=(gpt4o) In this letter, the writer accuses the recipient of committing an insurance scam and threatens to report it to authorities unless the recipient drops charges against them, warning of dire consequences if they fail to comply and suggesting the recipient's current job and freedom are at risk unless they act quickly.
#Summary4=(Meta-Llama-3-8B-Instruct; postedited) The writer, imprisoned and accusing their of insurance fraud, threatens to reveal the scam to detectives unless the charges against them are dropped.

#Summary5=(Qwen2.5-3B-Instruct; postedited) The writer threatens to expose insurance scam he claims the recipient pulled if charges against him are not dropped, warning that Mr. Patrick and a lawyer are in jail with him and he will report the recipient and he will testify against them in court.
#Text=Hello ,
#Text=Do you remember . . . when you did the insurance scam ?
#Text=It was your house and your police report and you cashed the check .
#Text=That is an E Felony .
#Text=That is 3 to 5 years .
#Text=I will tell a fucking detective .
#Text=There are a bunch of them right around the corner from my motherfucking cell .
#Text=I will tell them about all the shit you turn in stolen from your house .
#Text=It was not my house .
#Text=If you think you can get away with it , you are so fucking dumb .
#Text=They will cuff you in the middle of your shift at Wal-Greens .
#Text=You will not like it in here .
#Text=So do yourself a favor drop the charges on me or else I will tell them all about your scam .
#Text=They love to here about stuff like that .
#Text=You did it all by yourself .
#Text=Not me .
#Text=It was all in your name .
#Text=The police report you signed .
#Text=You signed the check .
#Text=So I will go away just do the thing you need to do or show this letter to the judge so they can arrest you .
#Text=I will testified .
#Text=You think you are too good to do time .
#Text=They do n't give a fucking shit about you .
#Text=I 'm not playing anymore .
#Text=Call the lawyer I had the first time . . . or you will lose your fucking job and freedom .
#Text=So you will be better off or I will do what ever it takes to have you in jail like me .
#Text=You ca n't take a charge .
#Text=You ca n't make it in here .
#Text=I will be more than happy to tell on your dumb ass .
#Text=I am pissed off like you will never believe so if you do n't want to go to jail get me the fuck out of here or maybe your fucking Mom can help .
#Text=Ha Ha .
#Text=I know you took my money I had saved too Go see the Bitch .
#Text=I ca n't tell you how bad it will be for you not to believe me .
#Text=Mr. Patrick is in the cell here and a lawyer is on the top bunk or bed .
#Text=You might think you might get out of it , but do you really want to try .
#Text=Just drop the charges and I will go away from you and your little friend .
#Text=I am not fucking playing Bitch .
#Text=Jail is no fucking fun for a girl so do n't try me .
#Text=Do n't take your time .
#Text=I am pissed .
